explains: adj. 自毁的；表现自杀欲望的

sentences.en: He had a reckless, self-destructive streak.
sentences.cn: 他生性鲁莽草率，有自毁倾向。

sentences.en: Social science can also teach politicians how to avoid our collective capacity for self-destructive behaviour.
sentences.cn: 社会科学也可以教会政客们如何避免我们的集体能力导致自我毁灭的行为。

sentences.en: that they would not engage in self-destructive behavior
sentences.cn: 他们不会做出自我毁灭的行为
